title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Todayâ€™s guest is Darrell Rogers and he is the Communications Director with the Alliance for Natural Health- USA, which... <!--more--> has been at the forefront for spearheading amendments to the Senate 510 Food Safety Bill, but ultimately wants it defeated.
Matt has a higher degree in Government studies from Catholic University in Washington DC and has worked in public policy and public affairs issues with Senatorial campaigning and on Capitol Hill.
He has also worked as a political affairs specialist for one of the largest political consulting firms in DC.
